name: Soul Bridge
description:
In Soul Bridge, you have died and your soul is stuck at Limbo. In order to escape the abyss’ eternal darkness, you need the knowledge of the Seers to light the way by revealing the Soul Bridges. Will you be able to collect all your soul fragments or will you be forever trapped in Limbo?

The idea of the game is to make it look Cute and Creepy and use your knowledge to reveal the right paths in order to get more points.

Move using W, A, S, D

Use the knowledge of the Seers 
to see the Soul Bridges by pressing 
Up, Down, Left, or Right

Collect the Soul Fragments

Code by Fixx
Art and Design by Akusan
